verses.name: Leviticus 9:9
verses.text: And the sons of Aaron brought the blood unto him: and he dipped his finger in the blood, and put it upon the horns of the altar, and poured out the blood at the bottom of the altar:

verses.name: Leviticus 9:10
verses.text: But the fat, and the kidneys, and the caul above the liver of the sin offering, he burnt upon the altar; as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Leviticus 9:11
verses.text: And the flesh and the hide he burnt with fire without the camp.

verses.name: Leviticus 9:12
verses.text: And he slew the burnt offering; and Aaron’s sons presented unto him the blood, which he sprinkled round about upon the altar.
